DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , 1:1 randomized Phase IIb study intradermal autologous Vigil™ cancer vaccine patient metastatic Ewing 's sarcoma Family Tumors ( ESFT ) refractory intolerant least 2 prior line chemotherapy . Patients undergo standard surgical procedure ( e.g. , tumor biopsy palliative resection ) may tumor tissue harvest manufacture investigational product . Patients meet eligibility criterion randomize receive either ( 1 ) intradermal Vigil every 28 day 4-12 administration , ( 2 ) gemcitabine 675 mg/m2 IV 10 mg/m2/min D1 D8 docetaxel 75 mg/m2 IV D8 every 21 day . The primary trial objective determine overall survival patient treat Vigil™ versus gemcitabine/docetaxel .
